meanings.definition: Relating to the geographical distribution of animals.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the zoogeographically diverse regions of the rainforest.
meanings.sent2: The zoogeographically distinct species of birds inhabit different parts of the island.
meanings.sent3: The zoogeographically separated penguins decided to have a dance-off.
meanings.sent4: The zoogeographically scattered population of deer roamed freely in the valley.
meanings.sent5: The zoogeographically unique patterns of migration fascinated the researchers.

meanings.definition: In a manner pertaining to the study of the geographic distribution of animal species.
meanings.sent1: The team of researchers traveled zoogeographically to observe the wildlife.
meanings.sent2: The data was collected zoogeographically to analyze the animal habitats.
meanings.sent3: The professor taught zoogeographically, using maps and charts to explain.
meanings.sent4: The students worked diligently, zoogeographically mapping out the animal territories.
meanings.sent5: The expedition moved zoogeographically through the forest, documenting each species encountered.
